name: Excursion Jungle Buggy Tour
description:
We'll pick you up at your hotel and drive you to our facility, 10 min away from downtown Playa del Carmen.
Our guide will welcome you and accompany you throughout the excursion. Equiped with a bandana and googles, you will ready for a 3 hours drive in the heart of the jungle, behind the wheel of one of our 4x4 buggy.
